name: Stadium Ludus
description:
Stadium Ludus is a small,  point and click style multiplayer game where you can compete with others in an arena. 

Gameplay

- Create rooms with up to 4 players.
- Choose a character and start a round.
- Attack, guard, sprint and use skills to achieve victory.
- Interact with objects to gain buffs.
- Fight until you defeat everybody.
- Rematch if you want to.

Characters

You can choose from two classes:

    - Barbarian: focused on close combat
    - Ranger: fights from afar

And from two fighting styles:

    - Heavy: strong, but slow
    - Light: quick, but less powerful
Controls

- mouse click: move, attack, interact with objects
- Q, W, E: use skills
- left shift: guard
- space: sprint

Notes

The combat system and playstyle is heavily inspired by the Diablo and Dark Souls series.
All models, animations, textures, graphics, sounds and music are made by me from scratch.
